data.text: Ɓoaze liini taa ziɠidaʋɛ, é zei ná. Pɛtɛ, zɔi unmɔɔ fai ma losuʋɛ ɠɛni zea, nii Ɓoaze ná-fai woni, naa ʋaani, é ɗa leʋe. Ɓoaze ɠɛni ma: «Ʋaa lɛɛ ʋɛ, zei lɛɛ ʋɛ.» Naa ʋaani, é zei.
Ɓoaze nu puugɔ zeɠeni taa ɠɛwolaiti saama, é ɠɛni ti ma: «À zei lɛɛ ʋɛ.» Ti zeini.
Naa ʋolu é ɠɛni naama nui ma, nii unmɔɔ fai ma losuʋɛ ɠɛni zea: «È suɠwɛɛni ga Naomi ʋa, é zeɠe Moaɓe yooi zu. Toɠa pɔ é zou ɓuɠai ʋɔdi, nii é ga ade-ɠɛɛloin Elimelɛke nɔnɔi.

Gè ɠisiɛʋɛ ga gè naa wo è ma, ga è geya taaʋeaiti gaazu, ta nà-nuɓusɛiti ta-ɠɛwolaiti gaazu. Ni ɗa pɔ è unmɔɔ, unmɔɔ. Ni è la unmɔɔsu, dɛɛ ga ze, gè ɠɛ kwɛɛ, mazɔlɔɔ ɗa ɠa mɔunpa ma losuʋɛ è ya. Nà ɠa é zèa ɗɔun è ʋoluma.» É gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Nà pɔ gè zooi unmɔɔ.»
Ɓoaze ɠɛni ma: «Foloi è zooi ɠeyazu la Naomi ma, ɗa Moaɓe nui Lute ɓalaagi zei naama ziɛgi zu, nii é ga poanzai, nii a kɛ sinigi nii saai, vofoda ɠɛ naa ʋa, niiti ta ná-poganii zeɠe.»

Zɔi unmɔɔ fai ma losuʋɛ ɠɛni zea, naa gooɠaaʋote, é ɠɛ ma: «Ni naa ʋe, gè ɠɛlɛa unmɔɔ tosuʋɛ ʋa, gè mina ʋa nà-poganii ɠoloɠolosu. Unmɔɔ fai ma losuʋɛ zeɠe ga ɗɔnɔ, mazɔlɔɔ gè la zooga gè ʋa unmɔɔ.»

Izilayɛle nuiti saama mɔungi, faa nɔpɛ a la ɠɛna ɠilia ba, é lo unmɔɔ faa ʋa, ɓaa anii maavalibo faa ʋa, gilagi ɓena ná-saʋalagi ɠula ɠɔɠɔa, é fe zɔi ya, naa ɓena ɠɛ ga poogi Izilayɛle nuiti bɛ ga naama vai ɓɛtɛa.
Zɔi unmɔɔ fai ma losuʋɛ ɠɛni zea, naa ɠɛni Ɓoaze ma: «Zooi ɠeya ɓɔɠɔ ʋɛ,» é ná-saʋalagi ɠulani ɠɔɠɔa.
Ɓoaze ɠɛni naazu kɛwolaiti ta nuɓusɛiti kpein ma: «Wo ɠɛa ga zeeleiti za, ga nii kpein é ɠɛa ga Elimelɛke nɔnɔ ta Kiliyon, naa ʋɛɛ Maalon ʋa, gè naati pɛ geyaa Naomi ma.

Gè Moaɓe nui Lute zeiɗa ɓalaa, é ɠɛ ga ànza, nii é ɠɛni ga Maalon anzai, ga nii saai naa laaseigi mina ɲɛɛlɛ ná-poganii zaama, naa ɠa a kɛ daaseigi yɛ ná ɠɔ kɛɛɠɛleaiti saama, sɔlɔɔ taa ziɠidaʋɛ. Wo ɠɛa ga ma zeeleiti za.»

Nuɓusɛi niiti kpein ti ɠɛni taa ziɠidaʋɛ ta kɛwolaiti, ti ɠɛni ma: «Gá ga naama zeeleiti! Anzanui é lɛɛzu ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI kɛ ga Zakɔɓe anzaiti Lasɛle ta Leani kɛʋele, niiti ti felegɔiti ti Izilayɛle ʋɛlɛyeɠei logai! Ɗa ɓɔɠɔi ɓalaa, tuyai ɠɛ è ma Efelata, ta è lɔɠɔ zɔlɔɔ Ɓɛteleyɛme!
Vofodai nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI feezu è ya ga anzanu loungoi nii maaʋele, é ɗa-ʋɛlɛyeɠei ɠɛ ga Pelɛze ná-pɛlɛyeɠei ɠɛʋele, nii Tamaal sɔlɔɔni Zuda ʋɛ!»
Ɓoaze Lute zeɠeni, é kɛ ga anza, é daani ʋolu. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI vaani bu Lute kogi zeɠe, é doun zunu zɔlɔɔ.
Anzanuiti ti ɠɛni Naomi ma: «Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, nii é la vaani bu, è ʋa ʋala za pɛlɛyeɠei makɛ nui ma, GALA ge kɛ daaseigi wɔɔlɔ Izilayɛle nuiti saama faan!
Doin nii ɠa è-yɛnvui niinɛ, é è makɛ ɗa wɔlɔzaɠana, mazɔlɔɔ è-loun anzai nii è nɛai bɛ, ta fizɔgai è ʋɛ zunu loun lɔfela ʋa, naa ɠa é sɔlɔɔgai.»
Naomi doin zeɠeni, é pɛɛ yiila. Tɔ ɠa é kulani su.
Anzanuiti ti ɠɛni ga seiɲɔɠɔiti, naati ti ɠɛ ma: «Doun zunu zɔlɔɔga Naomi ʋɛ!» Ti daasei pɛɛni ga Woɓɛde. Tɔ ɠa é ɠɛni ga Izayi kɛɛɠɛ, é ɠɛ ga Davide kɛɛɠɛwola.
Pelɛze mavofodaiti ta ga: Pelɛze Ɠɛsɛlon zɔlɔɔni,
Ɠɛsɛlon Lame zɔlɔɔ, Lame Aminadaɓe zɔlɔɔ,
Aminadaɓe Naason zɔlɔɔ, Naason Salema zɔlɔɔ,
Salema Ɓoaze zɔlɔɔ, Ɓoaze Woɓɛde zɔlɔɔ,
Woɓɛde Izayi zɔlɔɔ, ta Izayi Davide zɔlɔɔ.
